featureDescription.name: complexity
featureDescription.description:
Complexity rating for given token. 1 -> complex 0 -> not complex
NOTE: Complexity is set to 1 if at least 1 person (of 20) deemed a word complex.

featureDescription.name: complexitySum
featureDescription.description: The sum of all complexity ratings for given token. Min: 0 Max: 20
